summary: An ex-cop is hired to track down a serial killer who carries out his killings according to Bengali poetry.
cast: Prasenjit Chatterjee|Parambrata Chattopadhyay|Raima Sen|Abir Chatterjee|Goutam Ghose|Rajesh Sharma|Sumit Samaddar|Anindya Pulak Banerjee|Aronnok|Arindol Bagchi|Anandi Basu|Reeta Basu|Joyraj Bhattacharya|Samir Biswas|Biswajit Chakraborty|Kalyan Chatterjee|Chandan Das|Debabrata Das|Biplab Dasgupta|Bidhan Debnath|Abhijit Dutta|Achintya Dutta|Nitya Ganguly|Koushik Ghosh|Deboprasad Halder|June Malia|Ashok Mukherjee|Saptarshi Mukherjee|Sukdeb Mukherjee|Vikramjeet Mukherjee|Srijit Mukherji|OronnOnil|Purushottam Pandit|Soumyabrata Rakhsit|Agrodeep Roy|Triparna Sen|Ashish Singh|Suman Dey
title: Baishe Srabon
